pkgmetadata.longdescription: Anthy Unicode is another Anthy project and provides the library to input Japanese on the applications. This ebuild includes cannadic as a server-side dictionary, so you don't need any extra package to run it. You can use anthy-unicode with app-i18n/fcitx-anthy, app-i18n/uim (XIM, GTK+ immodule) and app-editors/emacs (to enable Anthy support for emacs, build this package with emacs USE flag).
